sense.gloss: to be buried, to be covered, to be surrounded
to overflow, to be crowded, to be filled
to be repaid (e.g. debt), to be replenished
to be filled (e.g. blank, vacancy, schedule)

sdata.j: ↑大東丸↑↓だいと|うまる|↓は↑４↑↓よ↓↑時↑↓じ↓に↑出港↑↓しゅっこう↓の↑予定↑↓よてい↓です。
sdata.e: The Daito-maru is scheduled to sail at 4:00.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑金晃丸↑↓きんこ|うまる|↓という↑種類↑↓しゅるい↓の↑仙人掌↑↓さぼてん↓を↑買↑↓か↓いました。
sdata.e: Today we bought a variety of cactus known as kinkoumaru.
